articles.title: As the dust settles with Windows 11, Microsoft is readying the rollout of Windows 10 21H2 - TechSpot
articles.description: Between the strict system requirements and all the bugs and performance problems, Windows 11 isn’t a typical Microsoft OS release. For one, many people can’t upgrade their...
articles.content: The big picture: Windows 11 is here, but not everyone can or should upgrade to the new operating system. For people who choose to stay on Windows 10 until the end of support in 2025, Microsoft has on… [+3816 chars]
